metadata.title: CVE-2020-18971 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based Buffer Overflow in PoDoFo v0.9.6 allows attackers to cause adenial of service via the component 'src/base/PdfDictionary.cpp:65'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18971` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.8+dfsg-3.1build3
libpodofo0.9.8t64 - 0.9.8+dfsg-3.1build3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.8+dfsg-3.1build3').
